body:
Folks,
I am writing a script that will take a bunch of HDR files and run the
glare analysis.
How can I dump the result of xglaresrc to a file (in PNG format, for
example)?
By default xglaresrc is calling ximage in the background, so I will end
up with a lot of windows. What I want is to capture those pop-up windows
and dump it to a file.
Thanks,
Ery
subject: [Radiance-general] dumping xglaresrc result to a file
